channel.title: Opening and closing doors at PI
channel.description:
I'm new at pi... Dnt flame me.
Okay, so I got the idea: use yanille as home. But ofc... its full of doors. So I wre just wondering how I can make the doors open and close?
I only need: Code to open Code to close Facing id's east, west, north, south.
Any help would be appreciated =P
